title: The No Sleep Palace 1v1 Championship is here!
body:
Hello all,
I am here to spread the word about a tournament I am hosting along with my Discord server, No Sleep Palace, in about 2 weeks time. It will be an open ranked, Single Elimination Bracket in which the No Sleep Palace 1v1 Champion will be crowned. We're looking into making this a regular weekly thing so be sure to show your support and interest by coming down and playing a few games with us! It's a great opportunity to meet some great people, thank you all for your interest and we'll see you on the rift! All details are on the Battlefy linked below.
~ The No Sleep Palace Staff Team.

https://battlefy.com/no-sleep-palace-tournaments/no-sleep-palace-1v1-championship-s1/5d86ced188ece346487edb8b/info?infoTab=details
https://discord.gg/2d52A7x

replies.body: {{champion:114}}Fiora: Insolent peasants. Submit, Scxred has already won.
